description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis – Heal Infertility With Self Hypnosis (For Men).' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

1. What is Infertility?

  • 1) Infertility is usually defined as the inability to conceive after twelve months of unprotected intercourse during the time of ovulation. 2) According to a study, male are responsible for approximately 25% of infertility. 2. Physical Causes of Infertility in Men: 1) Deficient sperm (low sperm production, impaired sperm mobility & sperm head shape) 2) Genetic problems 3) Exposure to toxins and radiation 4) Endocrine disorders 5) Mumps 6) Sexual transmitted diseases 7) Tight clothing 8) Excessive consumption of Alcohol, Caffeine or Drugs 3. Emotional Causes of Infertility: 1) Stress 2) Fear 3) Nervousness 4) Anxiety 4. How to Increase Fertility in Men: 1) A healthy diet 2) Vitamins 3) Supplements 4) Exercise 5) Correct body weight 6) Avoid cow's milk (as it is high in estrogen) 7) Avoid Soy products 5. How Self Hypnosis Can Help? 1) Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down 2) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully
  • This course is a must for those men who are suffering from general health issues and are unable to get rid of infertility problems mentally and physically.

It is ideal for every man who wants to heal his general health and improve his mental health caused due to infertility and conceiving problems.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 9 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture6:Guided Visualization Exercise: To Heal Infertility For Men

Lecture7:Guided Visualization Exercise: To Get Rid Of Negative Emotions

Lecture8:Summary

Lecture 9:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis – Heal Infertility With Self Hypnosis (For Men)
